title: Arsenal fans make Cristiano Ronaldo comparisons as they go wild for Gabriel Martinelli
text:
Arsenal fans went wild on social media after watching Gabriel Martinelli score twice in their 5-0 win over Nottingham Forest in the third round of the Carabao Cup.

Martinelli moved to Arsenal for £6million from Brazilian side Ituano this summer and made his second appearance for the Gunners on Tuesday night.

The striker has previously revealed he models his game on Cristiano Ronaldo and he showed the same razor sharp finishing in front of goal against Forest.

Arsenal fans went wild on social media after watching Gabriel Martinelli score twice

Martinelli scored his first goal of the night with a header from Callum Chambers' cross

Martinelli curled home a brilliant second goal in injury-time to cap a brilliant performance

The 18-year-old's display prompted praise from Arsenal fans on social media after the game

Martinelli scored his first goal of the night with a fine header from Callum Chambers' volleyed cross but it was his second strike in injury-time which left fans drooling.

The 18-year-old picked up the ball just inside the Forest half before beating several defenders and curling the ball into the top right-hand corner to complete a resounding win.

After the game, Gunners fans took to social media to talk up Martinelli's potential, with one Twitter user labelling him 'The heir to Aubameyang's throne'.

Another simply posted a picture of Cristiano Ronaldo in a Manchester United shirt and the caption: 'When Martinelli breaks into the first team', suggesting he will have the same impact for Arsenal as Ronaldo did at United.

If you thought that was high praise, Arsenal fan Eduado Hagn made the most of his 280 character limit to hail his performance.

He wrote: 'Gabriel Martinelli. 18 years of age. Blistering pace, unlimited stamina, immaculate close control, dazzling dribbling, clinical instinct, and a wavy name. I'm sorry to break it to you, but he is going to the very top. You could have a new club legend in the Brazilian.'
description: Arsenal fans went wild on social media after watching Gabriel Martinelli score twice in their 5-0 win over Nottingham Forest in the third round of the Carabao Cup. Martinelli  for £6million this summer.
